Package interfaces

Interface ISkill

public interface ISkill
This is an Interface for the skills used by the ConversationsEngine
Author:
Marcel Engelmann

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canExecute​(String intent, String currentState)
    Evaluates weather the skill can process the given intent or not
    ISkillAnswer execute​(String intent, org.json.JSONObject contextObject, String currentState)
    Executes the given intent
    void reset()
    Resets the skill.

  • Method Details

    • canExecute

      boolean canExecute​(String intent, String currentState)
      Evaluates weather the skill can process the given intent or not
      Parameters:
      intent - the intent to check
      currentState - the current state of the skill
      Returns:
      true if the skill can execute the given intent

    • execute

      ISkillAnswer execute​(String intent, org.json.JSONObject contextObject, String currentState)
      Executes the given intent
      Parameters:
      intent - the intent to be executed
      contextObject - the reference to the context object used by the ConversationsEngine
      currentState - the current state of the skill
      Returns:
      a new ISkillAnswer

    • reset

      void reset()
      Resets the skill. This is usually required when the user aborts a request
